full_summary:
===============

Tender Details
---------------

* **Tender Title**: Angle Blades (W6889-230150)
* **English Description**: The procurement involves the acquisition of angle blades for the Department of National Defence.
* **French Description**: La présente approvisionnement vise l'acquisition de lames d'angle pour le ministère de la Défense nationale.

Tender Specifications
----------------------

* **Reference Number**: WS3793875847-Doc3793907513
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3793875847
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 18, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: January 20, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2023

Procurement Details
-------------------

* **Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Petawawa

Contracting Entity
-----------------

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

Contact Information
-------------------

Limitations and Cancellation
----------------------------

This is a standalone notice and does not include any modifications or amendments. The open time begins on the tender closing date. Attempts to bid beyond the listed closing date will not be accepted.

*   **Recruitment Status**: Expired
